Class RepairArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • Locals.RepairArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MechanicRA

    public class RepairArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements MechanicRA
    Dedicated class to communicate with RepairArea using sockets.
